meanings: (지식·기능 등을) teach, (formal) instruct; (기술 등을) train, coach
전화 기본 표현 Please spell it for me.
전화 기본 표현 How is it spelled?
전화 기본 표현 Please tell me the spelling.
부탁 Can you give me the time?

phrases.phrase: 시험 범위를 가르쳐 줄 수 있어요?
meanings: 부탁 Can you please tell me what the test will be on?

vlive.korean: '오빠 내가 코로 매운 떡볶이를 먹는 법을 가르쳐 줄게'? "I will teach you how to eat tteok-bokki with your nose." 듣기 View video iKON : 짜자잔
vlive.english: "I will teach you how to eat tteok-bokki with your nose."

vlive.korean: "사나 씨 쯔위 그리고 중국어 가르쳐줄까? 원스를 가르쳐도 될까요?'' "SANA and TZUYU... Can I teach you Chinese?". Would that be okay? 듣기 View video TWICE : 🤭😐🔋❌
vlive.english: "SANA and TZUYU... Can I teach you Chinese?". Would that be okay?

vlive.korean: 가르쳐 줘요? Should I tell you? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 🐦우진🐦
가르쳐주시겠어요!? Teach me some. 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : ㅇㄱ
또 뭐 가르쳐줄까요? What else should I teach her? 듣기 View video TWICE : 🤍💙❤️
vlive.english: What else should I teach her?

examples.korean: He taught me the fundamentals of the job. 발음듣기 그가 내게 그 일의 핵심 사항들을 가르쳐 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He taught me the fundamentals of the job. 발음

examples.korean: Didi taught me how to read. 발음듣기 언니[누나]가 내게 글 읽는 걸 가르쳐 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Didi taught me how to read. 발음

examples.korean: Could you teach me to do that? 발음듣기 그것을 하는 법을 제게 좀 가르쳐 주시겠어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Could you teach me to do that? 발음

examples.korean: Lord knows, I tried to teach her. 발음듣기 하늘은 알지, 내가 그녀를 가르쳐 보려고 했다는 걸. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Lord knows, I tried to teach her. 발음

examples.korean: She showed her students the technique. 발음듣기 그녀는 학생들에게 그 기법을 보여[가르쳐] 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She showed her students the technique. 발음
